body:
The first line `$(function)`It is a shortcut to bind a function to jQuery's `document.ready` event from what I remember.

So in this context, it basically means: load this anonymous function on `document.ready` to have it available later.

The `$addLink` is only convention to tell, this object is a jQuery object, not vanillaJS.

body_text:
The first line $(function)It is a shortcut to bind a function to jQuery's document.ready event from what I remember.
So in this context, it basically means: load this anonymous function on document.ready to have it available later.
The $addLink is only convention to tell, this object is a jQuery object, not vanillaJS.
